lyrics.stanza: Of which I became a minister According to the stewardship Of God, which was given To me for you, To complete the word of God, The mystery which has been hidden From the ages and from the generations But now has been manifested To His saints; To whom God willed to make known What are the riches Of the glory of this mystery Among the Gentiles, Which is Christ in you, The hope of glory.
